meanings.definition: A type of sled used by the Inuit people.
meanings.sent1: The qamutik glided smoothly over the snow.
meanings.sent2: We loaded our gear onto the qamutik before heading out.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppies tried to ride the qamutik down the hill.
meanings.sent4: The qamutik was a loyal companion on our winter adventures.
meanings.sent5: The colorful qamutik stood out against the white landscape.

meanings.sent1: We qamutiked across the icy tundra.
meanings.sent2: In winter, it is common to qamutik to different villages.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to qamutik to the fishing spot for fun.
meanings.sent4: She qamutiked swiftly, enjoying the crisp air around her.
meanings.sent5: Qamutiking allowed us to explore the vast Arctic wilderness.

meanings.definition: The act of pulling a qamutik.
meanings.sent1: The teamwork involved in qamutik pulling was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The qamutik pulling competition was a highlight of the festival.
meanings.sent3: He pretended to struggle with the heavy qamutik pulling.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic sound of qamutik pulling echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The children took turns experiencing the joy of qamutik pulling.
